About Me

A few things about me.

BIO

Hello! I am an Electrical Engineering graduate from the University of Alberta (2017). My work experience includes co-op work terms and roughly half a year working at Tango Networks Inc. as a junior engineer. Software engineering has always been my dream, so I am returning to school at NAIT to commit to my new career path.
